This endpoint allows users to open a leveraged position by specifying loan details, margin, leverage, and additional instructions.

parameters.name: userPubKey
parameters.description: The public key of the user initiating the trade. This identifies the trader and links the trade to their account.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to sell an existing leveraged position, repaying the borrowed funds and releasing any remaining collateral.
This endpoint allows users to repay a leveraged position, repaying the borrowed funds and releasing any remaining collateral.
This endpoint allows users to repay a leveraged position, repaying the borrowed funds and releasing any remaining collateral.
This endpoint allows users to split a leveraged position into multiple positions.
This endpoint allows users to merge multiple positions into a single position.
This endpoint allows users to update a position.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to submit a take profit order for a trade.

put.description: This endpoint allows users to update a take profit order for a trade.

delete.description: This endpoint allows users to delete a take profit order for a trade.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to open a leveraged position by specifying loan details, margin, leverage, and additional instructions.
This endpoint allows users to close a leveraged position by specifying the loan ID and offer ID.

201.description: Returns the newly created API key

post.summary: Create a new API key for the partner

info.title: Lavarage API
info.description: API documentation for Lavarage SDK methods

interestRate.description: The annualized interest rate (%) for the loan offer. This value represents the total interest charged over a year.

collateralType.description: The token address of the collateral token that can be used for this loan offer.

maxBorrow.description: Represents the highest amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that a single borrower can borrow in one transaction.

nodeWallet.description: The public key of the wallet used to manage the loan offer.

maxExposure.description: The maximum exposure limit sets an upper cap on the amount of the quoteToken (SOL, USDC) that can be borrowed cumulatively across all borrowers under a specific loan offer. Provided in the smallest unit of the quoteToken (lamports for SOL).

currentExposure.description: Represents the total amount of funds currently borrowed across all active loans under a specific loan offer. It reflects how much of the liquidity allocated to the loan offer is already in use.

address.description: The token address of the collateral token that can be used for this loan offer.

logoURI.description: The logo URI of the token.

publicKey.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

collateralToken.description: The token used as collateral for the loan offer. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

maxLeverage.description: The highest multiplier a borrower can use on their collateral to amplify their borrowing power.

maxOpenPerTrade.description: Defines the maximum loan amount that can be borrowed in a single transaction under a specific loan offer, regardless of the collateral or leverage used.

availableForOpen.description: Represents the remaining liquidity in a loan offer that is available to borrowers for opening new positions. It reflects the amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that can still be borrowed without exceeding the loan pool's total capacity (maxExposure).

publicKey.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

apr.description: The annualized interest rate (%) for the loan offer. This value represents the total interest charged over a year.

maxBorrow.description: Represents the highest amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that a single borrower can borrow in one transaction.

nodeWallet.description: The public key of the wallet used to manage the loan offer.

maxExposure.description: The maximum exposure limit sets an upper cap on the amount of the quoteToken (SOL, USDC) that can be borrowed cumulatively across all borrowers under a specific loan offer. Provided in the smallest unit of the quoteToken (lamports for SOL).

currentExposure.description: Represents the total amount of funds currently borrowed across all active loans under a specific loan offer. It reflects how much of the liquidity allocated to the loan offer is already in use.

collateralToken.description: The token used as collateral for the loan offer. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

maxLeverage.description: The highest multiplier a borrower can use on their collateral to amplify their borrowing power.

maxOpenPerTrade.description: Defines the maximum loan amount that can be borrowed in a single transaction under a specific loan offer, regardless of the collateral or leverage used.

availableForOpen.description: Represents the remaining liquidity in a loan offer that is available to borrowers for opening new positions. It reflects the amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that can still be borrowed without exceeding the loan pool's total capacity (maxExposure).

active.description: Whether the loan offer is active.

account.description: The price of the collateral token in the quote token.

publicKey.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

apr.description: The annualized interest rate (%) for the loan offer. This value represents the total interest charged over a year.

maxBorrow.description: Represents the highest amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that a single borrower can borrow in one transaction.

nodeWallet.description: The public key of the wallet used to manage the loan offer.

maxExposure.description: The maximum exposure limit sets an upper cap on the amount of the quoteToken (SOL, USDC) that can be borrowed cumulatively across all borrowers under a specific loan offer. Provided in the smallest unit of the quoteToken (lamports for SOL).

currentExposure.description: Represents the total amount of funds currently borrowed across all active loans under a specific loan offer. It reflects how much of the liquidity allocated to the loan offer is already in use.

collateralToken.description: The token used as collateral for the loan offer. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC. Use the "includeToken" query parameter to include the token metadata.

maxLeverage.description: The highest multiplier a borrower can use on their collateral to amplify their borrowing power.

maxOpenPerTrade.description: Defines the maximum loan amount that can be borrowed in a single transaction under a specific loan offer, regardless of the collateral or leverage used.

availableForOpen.description: Represents the remaining liquidity in a loan offer that is available to borrowers for opening new positions. It reflects the amount of the quoteToken (e.g., SOL, USDC) that can still be borrowed without exceeding the loan pool's total capacity (maxExposure).

active.description: Whether the loan offer is active.

account.description: The price of the collateral token in the quote token.

offerId.description: The unique identifier of the loan offer being utilized for this position. This should correspond to an offerId from the GET Loan Offers endpoint.

marginSOL.description: The amount of collateral being deposited in SOL or USDC.

leverage.description: The leverage multiplier applied to the position. For example: "2" means the trader is borrowing 2x the collateral.

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of the partner that will receive any applicable fees for facilitating this trade.

partnerFeeMarkupBps.description: The markup percentage for the partner fee. For example: "200" represents a 2% markup on the total trade amount (margin + borrow amount) * 0.02.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

slippage.description: The maximum acceptable price slippage percentage during the trade execution. Example: "500" indicates a 5% slippage tolerance.

userPubKey.description: The public key of the user initiating the trade. This identifies the trader and links the trade to their account.

chain.description: Chain to use for the position

transaction.description: A base58-encoded Solana VersionedTransaction object, representing the serialized transaction details for a trade. This includes instructions, signatures, and other transaction metadata.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be closed. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

offerId.description: The unique identifier of the loan offer associated with this position.

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of a partner to receive any associated fees for facilitating this trade.

profitFeeMarkup.description: An optional markup applied to the closing profit fee. For example, 0.02 represents a 2% additional markup.

partnerFeeMarkupBps.description: The markup percentage for the partner fee. For example: "200" represents a 2% markup on the total trade amount (margin + borrow amount) * 0.02.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

slippage.description: The maximum acceptable price slippage percentage during the trade execution. Example: "500" indicates a 5% slippage tolerance.

userPubKey.description: The public key of the user initiating the trade. This identifies the trader and links the trade to their account.

chain.description: Chain to use for the position

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be closed. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of the partner that will receive any applicable fees for facilitating this trade.

profitFeeMarkup.description: An optional markup applied to the closing profit fee. For example, 0.02 represents a 2% additional markup.

partnerFeeMarkupBps.description: The markup percentage for the partner fee. For example: "200" represents a 2% markup on the total trade amount (margin + borrow amount) * 0.02.

repaymentBps.description: The percentage (in basis points) of the position to be repaid. For example, 200 represents a 2% repayment.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

userPubKey.description: The public key of the user initiating the trade. This identifies the trader and links the trade to their account.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be closed. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of a partner to receive any associated fees for facilitating this trade.

profitFeeMarkup.description: An optional markup applied to the closing profit fee. For example, 0.02 represents a 2% additional markup.

repaymentBps.description: The percentage (in basis points) of the position to be repaid. For example, 200 represents a 2% repayment.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

userPubKey.description: The public key of the user initiating the trade. This identifies the trader and links the trade to their account.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be split. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

firstPositionId.description: The unique identifier of the first position to be merged. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

secondPositionId.description: The unique identifier of the second position to be merged. This is obtained from previously opened position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

positionPublicKey.description: The unique identifier of the position.

action.description: Action to be performed on the position

pool.description: The public key of the liquidity pool from which funds were borrowed for this position. Links the position to a specific loan offer.

closeStatusRecallTimestamp.description: A timestamp indicating when the position was marked for recall. Default is "00" if the position is active and not scheduled for closure.

amount.description: The borrowed amount for this position in the smallest unit of the quoteToken.

userPaid.description: The total amount paid back by the trader so far (partial repay), in the smallest unit of the quoteToken (can be SOL or USDC).

collateralAmount.description: The amount of collateral used to open the position.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the position was opened.

trader.description: The public key of the trader who opened the position.

seed.description: A unique identifier generated for this position.

closeTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the position was closed. Default is "00" if the position is still active.

closingPositionSize.description: The size of the position. Default is "00" if the position is still open.

interestRate.description: The annualized interest rate (%) applied to the borrowed amount for this position.

lastInterestCollect.description: The timestamp of the most recent interest collection for this position. Default is "00" if no interest has been collected yet.

publicKey.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

takeProfitPrice.description: The take profit price set for this position.

onChainStatus.description: The status of the position on chain.

entryPrice.description: The entry price at which the trade was opened, displayed in the quoteToken.

interestAccrued.description: The interest accrued on the position.

liquidationPrice.description: The liquidation price of the position.

publicKey.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

takeProfitPrice.description: The take profit price set for this position.

onChainStatus.description: The status of the position on chain.

openTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the position was opened.

closeTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the position was closed. Default is "00" if the position is still active.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

collateralToken.description: The token used as collateral for the loan offer.

initialBorrowQuote.description: The borrowed amount for this position in the smallest unit of the quoteToken.

initialMarginQuote.description: The total amount paid back by the trader so far (partial repay), in the smallest unit of the quoteToken (can be SOL or USDC).

apr.description: The annualized interest rate (%) applied to the borrowed amount for this position.

lastInterestCollectTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the most recent interest collection for this position.

initialPositionBase.description: The amount of collateral used to open the position.

closePositionQuote.description: The size of the position. Only for closed positions.

currentPrice.description: The current price of the token.

currentPositionBase.description: The current size of the position.

currentLtv.description: The current LTV of the position.

entryPrice.description: The entry price at which the trade was opened, displayed in the quoteToken.

interestAccrued.description: The interest accrued on the position.

liquidationPrice.description: The liquidation price of the position.

positionAddress.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

offerAddress.description: The unique public key identifying the loan offer.

traderAddress.description: The public key of the trader who opened the position.

offerCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the offer was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the position was updated.

takeProfitPrice.description: The take profit price set for this position.

onChainStatus.description: The status of the position on chain.

isActionable.description: The position is actionable or not.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be closed. This is obtained from previously opened trades or position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of a partner to receive any associated fees for facilitating this trade.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

targetPrice.description: The target price for the take profit order. The price at which the take profit order will be triggered.

retriggerAt.description: The retrigger price for the take profit order. The price at which the take profit order will be invalidated and needs retriggering if the price moves in the opposite direction before the order is executed.

positionId.description: The unique identifier of the position to be closed. This is obtained from previously opened trades or position queries (e.g., GET Open Positions).

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer, can be SOL or USDC.

collateralAddress.description: The collateral address of the loan offer.

margin.description: The amount of collateral being deposited.

leverage.description: The leverage multiplier applied to the position.

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of the partner that will receive any applicable fees for facilitating this trade.

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer.

userPubKey.description: The wallet address (public key) of the signer.

gasLimit.description: The estimated gas limit that should be used to send the swap transaction to guarantee settlement

gasPrice.description: The gas price (in wei) that should be used to send the swap transaction

txHash.description: The transaction hash calculated from the transaction data

loanId.description: The loan ID of the position to close

userPubKey.description: The wallet address (public key) of the signer

partnerFeeRecipient.description: The wallet address (public key) of the partner that will receive any applicable fees for facilitating this trade

quoteToken.description: The token used for quoting the loan offer
